name: centralized-logging-indexing
description: A Lambda function for the centralized logging indexing microservice

scripts.test: env DomainEndpoint='es-endpoint.us-east-1.es.amazonaws.com' MasterRole='master_role_needs_to_be_longer' SessionId='session_id' Owner='Spoke' LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG mocha lib/*.spec.js
scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && rm -f archive.zip && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/lib
scripts.build:copy: cp index.js dist/ && cp -r lib/*.js dist/lib && cp lib/basic-dashboard.json dist/lib
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
scripts.zip: cd dist && rm -f package-lock.json && zip -rq clog-indexing-service.zip .
